docs.snippet: On a lake in Guatemala, Joyce Maynard found her refuge — until nature decided to take it back....
docs.abstract: Writer Joyce Maynard recounts experience of returning to Lake Atitlan in Guatemala, a place sheltered from the rigors of the modern world, after 28 years; describes multiple disasters she survived while there and speculates as to their cause.
docs.lead_paragraph: On a lake in Guatemala, Joyce Maynard found her refuge — until nature decided to take it back.
